Dgame.Graphics.Blend



interface Blendable;
Enable blending

abstract pure nothrow void setBlend(Blend blend);
Set (or reset) the current Blend instance.

abstract inout pure nothrow inout(Blend) getBlend();
Returns the current Blend instance, or null.

class Blend;
The Blend class. If you want that a blendable object get some blend, create an instance of this class and give it to your blendable.

Author:
rschuett

enum Mode: ubyte;
Supported BlendModes

None
No blending.

Alpha
Pixel = Src * a + Dest * (1 - a)

Add
Pixel = Src + Dest

Multiply
Pixel = Src * Dest

const void applyBlending();
Apply the blending

final this(Mode mode);
CTor

final this(Mode mode, ref const Color col);
CTor

final this(Mode mode, const Color col);
Rvalue version

final const void enable(bool enable);
Enable or Disable blending

final pure nothrow void enableColor(bool enable);
Activate or deactivate the using of the blend color.

final pure nothrow void setBlendMode(Mode mode);
Set the Blendmode.

final const pure nothrow Mode getBlendMode();
Returns the current Blendmode.

final void setBlendColor(ref const Color col);
Set the Blend Color.

final void setBlendColor(const Color col);
Rvalue version

final const pure nothrow ref const(Color) getBlendColor();
Returns the current Blend Color.
